Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Updates the South Lockport Volunteer Exempt Firemen's Benevolent Association's charter
Summary: Updates the South Lockport Volunteer Exempt Firemen's Benevolent Association's charter; amends the purposes of such organization and the permitted uses of certain insurance premium taxes collected.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 978 of the laws of 1966 relating to incorporating the South Lockport Volunteer Firemen's Benevolent Association, and providing for its powers and duties, in relation to amendments to such association's charter
